availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Edward Hinkle (Ballard County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Ann M. E. Hinkle. Father of William Hinkle, Hala Hinkle, and Jesse Hinkle. Physician in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard, Lovelaceville District, p. 25.
Find A Grave, "Charles Hinkle (March 13, 1838-September 13, 1904)," Memorial #64030295, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/64030295 (accessed March 20, 2018).
